ORDER
The offences alleged are under Sections
420,406, 465,467, 468,471,34 of IPC. The mtter is
settled out of court. Defacto complainant filed a
sworn statement in that behalf. Hence it will not
serve any purpose, if it is proceeded further. The
entire proceedings are hereby quashed. The Crl.M.C. is
allowed accordingly.
Sd/-
P. SOMARAJAN
JUDGE
